results.title: Apple hosts Apple TV media event, here’s everything that’s been announced - 9to5Mac
results.content:
Go to the 9to5Mac home page

 Apple TV

# Apple hosts Apple TV media event, here’s everything that’s been announced

Ryan Christoffel | Feb 3 2026 - 12:01 pm PT

0 Comments

Apple is hosting a special media event today called the ‘2026 Apple TV Press Day.’ Here’s everything that’s been announced at the event so far.

## Apple unveils new original TV shows and movies coming soon

Today in Santa Monica, California, Apple is hosting a major invite-only media event focused on its streaming service.

In attendance are a variety of current and future Apple TV stars, such as Jon Hamm, Anya Taylor-Joy, Kurt Russell, Jennifer Garner, Keanu Reeves, James Marsden, and more.

‘2026 Apple TV Press Day’ has brought unveilings of several new original TV shows and movies. [...] Here’s everything that’s been announced so far: [...] This post will be updated as more announcements are made…

Apple TV is available for $12.99 per month, or you can get it discounted through the Apple One bundle.

### Best iPhone accessories

 Apple’s new AirTag 2 (1-pack / 4-pack)
 10-year AirTag battery case 2-pack
 MagSafe Car Mount for iPhone
 AirPods Pro 3
 100W USB-C fast charging power adapter

results.title: Vision Pro Shift Reveals New Focus On AI Glasses In 2025 – Why It Matters - Glass Almanac
results.content:
Skip to content 

# Vision Pro Shift Reveals New Focus On AI Glasses In 2025 – Why It Matters

Post on Facebook Post on Flipboard Share on LinkedIn Post on Reddit Share on Threads Share on X Send through Whatsapp

Shockwaves hit October 2025 after Apple paused its Vision Pro overhaul. This matters now because the pivot shifts engineering and marketing focus from a bulky headset to sleeker, AI-driven glasses that target a wider market. Reuters and Bloomberg reported the pause and resource reallocation on Oct 1, 2025, a verified corporate roadmap change. The move signals Apple betting on software and form-factor scalability rather than a rushed hardware revamp-an admission that Vision Pro’s premium path needs rethinking. Will this force rivals and developers to rewrite plans for AR in 2026? [...] ## What changes for developers and buyers after Apple’s 2025 pivot

> • Apple paused the Vision Pro overhaul on Oct 1, 2025; resources moved to AI glasses.
>
> • visionOS 26 added Apple Intelligence in April 2025; software updates increased Vision Pro capabilities.
>
> • Bloomberg and Reuters reported the pause; enterprise roadmap now prioritizes compact AR products.

## Why Apple’s 2025 Vision Pro shift accelerates the race to AR glasses [...] ## Similar Posts

 Vision Air Shelved As Apple Pushes Smart Glasses For 2026, Why It Matters

 Vision Pro Overhaul Shelved In 2025 – Why Developers And Buyers Should Care
